name: The Wizard Ran 3
description:
• Next game: December 21st
  • Previous game
  • First game

The third episode in the wizard's adventures, this time in 3D! 

You've just entered the cursed forest. In it, there are cursed monsters. Will you survive?

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: move
  • Spacebar/X/Shift: interact
  • Use the mouse for some actions
  • You cannot reach B in this game
